question: By selling an article, a man makes a profit of 25% of its selling price. His profit per cent is:
explanation:
If the SP of article be x, 
then its CP $latex = x - \\frac{x}{4} = \\frac{3x}{4}Rs.&s=1$
$latex \\therefore Gain \\% = \\frac{\\frac{x}{4}}{\\frac{3x}{4}}\\times 100&s=1$
$latex = \\frac{100}{3} = 33\\frac{1}{3}\\%&s=1$
Hence option [C] is the right answer.
